FirstCash, Inc.
FirstCash Holdings, Inc. is the leading international operator of pawn stores and a leading provider of technology-driven point-of-sale payment solutions, both focused on serving cash and credit-constrained consumers.
FirstCash’s more than 3,000 pawn stores in 29 U.S. states and the District of Columbia and in Latin America, which includes all the states in Mexico and the countries of Guatemala, Colombia and El Salvador, sell a wide variety of jewelry, electronics, tools, appliances, sporting goods, musical instruments and other merchandise, and make small non-recourse pawn loans secured by pledged personal property.
FirstCash, through its wholly owned subsidiary, AFF, also provides lease-to-own and retail finance payment solutions for consumer goods and services through a nationwide network of over 14,000 active retail merchant partner locations.
The Company employs approximately 20,000 people between the U.S. and Latin America. FirstCash is a component company in both the Standard & Poor’s MidCap 400 Index® and the Russell 2000 Index®.

Contact Us
Customer service is a top priority at First Cash. We encourage you to contact us to let us know how we are doing.
Click on any of the departments (below) for more information.
Customer Service
Corporate Office
1600 West 7th Street
Fort Worth, Texas 76102
Phone: 1-800-572-3577
Please email
customerservice@firstcash.com
for any concerns or compliments.

Investor Relation Contacts
Employment and Income Verifications
Employment and Income Verifications
Please visit
www.cccverify.com
Customer Service (toll free) (855)-901-3099 available Monday through Friday; 8 am – 8 pm EST
Direct Fax 614-495-0225
Our verification partner CCC Verify provides all employment and income verifications. The information is available instantly, 24 hours a day, seven days per week. You will need to have a permissible purpose for dates of employment and clearance to access wage information. If you are not yet registered as a CCC Verify user, please visit
www.cccverify.com
and sign up. The process is simple and only takes a few moments. After you have created an account, you may visit the website as often as needed to obtain verification reports instantly.  For certain government verifiers there is no fee for this service, and verifications requested through CCC Verify are fulfilled instantly. Requests from government verifiers made directly to FirstCash will be forwarded to CCC Verify and could take longer to complete.
